index.name: Dmitry Dudarev
index.description: Hi, I'm a Front-End developer, passionate about creating different kinds of applications for more than 5 years.
index.stack: Right now, my favourite stack consists of

nextjs.description: Currently the best React (and in general) meta framework in my opinion, very handy roaming with SSR and SSG functionality.

react.description: The most convenient JS framework for me due to its closeness to native JS. NextJS is built on top of it.

typescript.description: Typing for JavaScript, musthave, modern projects can't exist without it.

tailwind.description: An incredibly handy tool for quick styling, with many awesome UI libraries built on top of it.

shadcn.description: Unusual, fully customisable UI kit on TailwindCSS, I use it in all new projects

zustand.description: Fast, scalable state manager built on Flux and Immutable state principles

reactquery.description: Hooks for request management, usually used in tandem with Axios for API communication
